about_the_game:
◆STORY
Become the protagonist and live at your aunt's house in the countryside during the summer.
You can input your own name, and protagonist doesn't talk much,
only the aunt talks for a more immersive experience.

◆SYSTEM

Deepen the bond with your aunt in command-based Simulation game.
Choose your interaction with her at night.
Certain interactions will increase her Affection Level at a cost of your Action Point.
A day ends when your Action Point reaches zero.

You can't do much in the beginning, but as the Affection Level rises,
you can sleep or take a bath together with your aunt.
And when it reaches a certain level, you can do even more... "intimate" things with her!
You can watch the Ending when Affection level maxes out,
and can continue to stay with your aunt for as long as you want.

◆LIVING WITH YOUR AUNT
From having a small chat to taking a bath together...!
Raise Affection Level to unlock more interactions with your aunt.

◆OUTING WITH YOUR AUNT
There are plenty of outing events to explore.
At higher Affection Levels, you may encounter different events in places you've been before.

◆SEX WITH YOUR AUNT
She may not let you kiss her at the beginning,
but as Affection Level goes up, you will be able to request more "extreme" actions!


Animated H events will be story-driven for the first time,
then you will be able to choose your action from second time onwards!
Feel like going hard tonight? Or take it easy? Up to you!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, Sexual scenes.

It also contain non-consensual sex, sexual harassment, incest, BDSM, exhibitionism and pregnancy.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8,10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
